医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
小菌素为治疗霍乱提供了有前景的新方法每年有超过一百万人死于对抗菌药物有抗药性的病原体感染，而且这个问题还在日益严重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Microcins-offer-promising-new-approach-to-treating-cholera.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Microcins-offer-promising-new-approach-to-treating-cholera.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cea654b1-3fdf-43be-ad40-0f7c99b148b0 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 16:11:51 -0400 Microcins offer promising new approach to treating cholera
新型超声技术为尿路结石提供有效治疗美国泌尿外科协会 (AUA) 官方期刊《泌尿学杂志》十月号上的一项临床试验报道，一种名为 Break Wave™ 碎石术 (BWL) 的无创超声技术为治疗尿路结石提供了一种安全有效的新选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/New-ultrasound-technology-provides- effective-treatment-for-urinary-stones.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/New-ultrasound-technology-provides- effective-treatment-for-urinary-stones.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eba8a0fd-297d-4168-8780-6c0df08274e1 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 16:05:37 -0400 New ultrasound technology provides effective treatment for urinary stones
抗生素破坏保护性肠道粘液并增加 IBD 风险在今天发表在《科学进展》上的一项具有里程碑意义的研究中，Shai Bel 博士和他在巴伊兰大学 Azrieli 医学院的研究团队发现了关于抗生素使用如何增加炎症性肠病 (IBD) 风险的重要见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Antibiotics-disrupt-protective-gut-mucus-and-heighten-IBD-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Antibiotics-disrupt-protective-gut-mucus-and-heighten-IBD-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e836d17-82ac-4eef-9a8c-a26c26005b0f Wed, 11 Sep 2024 16:00:00 -0400 Antibiotics disrupt protective gut mucus and heighten IBD risk
研究显示戒烟后房颤风险较低根据今天发表在《JACC：临床电生理学》上的一项研究，与继续吸烟的人相比，戒烟可以显着降低人患心房颤动 (AFib) 的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Study-reveals-lower-risk-of-atrial-fibrillation-after-quitting-smoking.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Study-reveals-lower-risk-of-atrial-fibrillation-after-quitting-smoking.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e557342-e1b1-4868-96eb-67e697b4028c Wed, 11 Sep 2024 15:55:47 -0400 Study reveals lower risk of atrial fibrillation after quitting smoking
350 万美元赠款资助与儿童因素相关的健康差异的重大研究在美国，富人的平均寿命比穷人长 10 年，黑人的平均寿命比白人短 5 年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/2435M-grant-funds-major-study-on-health-disparities-linked-to-childhood-factors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/2435M-grant-funds-major-study-on-health-disparities-linked-to-childhood-factors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89ce000a-8c6f-47b5-b7fe-2db5db493b1e Wed, 11 Sep 2024 15:51:52 -0400 $3.5M grant funds major study on health disparities linked to childhood factors
新算法揭示了多种癌症的关键基因突变计算机算法可以有效地找到共同驱动癌症的基因突变以及其他重要的遗传线索，研究人员有一天可能会利用这些线索来开发针对各种癌症的新疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/New-algorithm-unveils-key-genic-mutations-across-multiple-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/New-algorithm-unveils-key-genic-mutations-across-multiple-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a333bfc-f4a4-4f68-909e-ede2e27e0890 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 15:41:53 -0400 New algorithm unveils key genetic mutations across multiple cancers
研究揭示人类膝骨的独特进化与直立行走有关一项新的研究发现，灵长类动物膝盖骨骼的进化可能对人类如何进化成直立行走产生影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Study-reveals-unique-evolution-of-knee-bone-in- humans-linked-to-upright-walking.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Study-reveals-unique-evolution-of-knee-bone-in- humans-linked-to-upright-walking.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b6a17c8-00ff-4809-97d1-f960c903df07 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 15:36:10 -0400 Study reveals unique evolution of knee bone in humans linked to upright walking
Ropirio Therapeutics 获得新型淋巴系统激活剂的独家许可哈佛大学 Wyss 研究所今天宣布，Ropirio Therapeutics, Inc. (Ropirio) 已获得哈佛大学技术开发办公室 (OTD) 和波士顿大学 (BU) 技术开发办公室的全球独家许可，用于激活新型分子淋巴系统——制药行业首创。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Ropirio-Therapeutics-secures-exclusive-license-for-novel-lymphatic-system-activators.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Ropirio-Therapeutics-secures-exclusive-license-for-novel-lymphatic-system-activators.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a5b9eb96-30bd-46db-a957-c44e1a629053 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 15:34:06 -0400 Ropirio Therapeutics secures exclusive license for novel lymphatic system activators
发现四个基因显着影响更年期时间和癌症风险新的研究发现了迄今为止发现的对更年期时间影响最大​​的四种基因，为更年期时间与癌症风险之间的联系提供了新的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Four-genes-found-to-significantly-influence-menopause-timing-and-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Four-genes-found-to-significantly-influence-menopause-timing-and-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=362ee757-755b-4fc7-93bc-b8d837228e57 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 14:55:58 -0400 Four genes found to significantly influence menopause timing and cancer risk
研究揭示了多种形式的痴呆症共有和独特的分子标记研究人员首次发现了与退化相关的“分子标记”——细胞及其基因调节网络中可观察到的变化——这些变化是影响大脑不同区域的几种形式的痴呆症所共有的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Study-reveals-shared-and-unique-molecular-markers-across-multiple-forms-of-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Study-reveals-shared-and-unique-molecular-markers-across-multiple-forms-of-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6de073ee-e659-4909-bf57-cef257c71fcb Wed, 11 Sep 2024 14:49:05 -0400 Study reveals shared and unique molecular markers across multiple forms of dementia
